name: The Little Tractor That Could
description:
Created for a game jam where the theme is to bring social awareness through video games, we have decided to touch on the issue of Climate Change where excessive lodging has brought a huge negative impact towards our environment. Playing as a cute little tractor, your goal is to mow down as many trees as possible. But there are also houses in the way that you will need to jump over to avoid. As you mow down more trees, more houses will be in your way, making it more challenging for you to avoid them. The terrain will also be steeper as more trees disappear, making it more challenging to move forward.

The game features a simple gameplay loop and controls which makes it accessible for players of all ages. The cute and vibrant visuals are also intentional in bringing an impact towards the message of climate change as players reaches the end of the game with the change in color and mood.  Hope you enjoy the game and all feedback would be very much appreciated, all the best and have fun! ^^

Controls:

  • Right and Left arrow keys: Move forward and Backwards
  • Spacebar: Jump
